meanings.definition: A stroke in tennis or other racket sports made with the palm of the hand facing in the direction of the stroke.
meanings.sent1: She practiced her forehand every day to improve her tennis game.
meanings.sent2: His forehand was strong and accurate, helping him win the match.
meanings.sent3: During the tournament, her forehand became her secret weapon.
meanings.sent4: His forehand was like a powerful weapon on the court, striking fear into his opponents.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of a solid forehand for success in tennis.

meanings.sent1: The forehand seats were reserved for VIP guests at the event.
meanings.sent2: The forehand view from the room overlooked the beautiful garden.
meanings.sent3: The forehand table was set with exquisite decorations for the special dinner.
meanings.sent4: The forehand position in the meeting allowed him to lead the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The forehand row of seats provided the best view of the stage.
